p: Î” 9-tetrahydrocannabinolic acid (THCA) and cannabidiolic acid (CBDA) were purchased from THC Pharm (Frankfurt am Main, Germany). Cannabigerolic acid (CBGA) was obtained from Taros Chemicals (Dortmund, Germany). Olivetolic acid (OA) was purchased from Santa Cruz Biotechnology, Inc. (Heidelberg, Germany). Geranyl diphosphate (GPP) was synthesised according to Woodside et al. [ 59]. Carvone, myrcene, palmitic acid (PA) and oleic acid (OLA) were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (Darmstadt, Germany).
